channel.title: David Harvey on Peter's weblog
channel.description: Recent content in David Harvey on Peter's weblog

item.title: Anti Capitalist Chronicles: Global Unrest
item.description: In this final episode of the season, Prof. Harvey starts with the protests in Chile and then talks about the unrest emerging all over the globe. Capitalism, particularly Neo-liberalism, is working for the 1% but is failing the rest of society. People are starting to notice and taking to the streets in protest. Web link to original article

item.title: David Harvey - The Rate and Mass of Growth
item.description: In this lecture, David Harvey offers a close reading of Volume III of Karl Marxâ€™s Capital to distinguish the rate of growth versus the mass of growth. Most economists, policy makers, politicians, and the financial press are very concerned about the rate of growth. The rate of growth is in turn critical to the formulation of policy. Yet the mass of growth is actually more significant, and deserves careful analysis. This lecture will devote special attention to the mass of growth.

item.title: Anti Capitalist Chronicles Social Reproduction Part 1
item.description: Prof. Harvey is joined by CUNY Graduate Center Professor Cindi Katz to discuss social reproduction and its relation and significance to capitalism’s success.
